TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content:
The Book of Yoda Feet.

There is no try, there is only New Page.

Too much free time the people have for hotthreadding.
Your rocket isn't shiny enough.

May the farts be with you, always.
The Moon gets farther every day.
The moon follows me wherever I go.
Now it's clear why the moon is chaotically wandering today.
What is the Moon good for anyway?
For funding.

I stay out to bake

But I keep juicing

It's like I got this music
In my mind
